price: 60. Malheur à ceux qui ont mécru, quand (viendra) ce jour qui est le leur et dont ils sont menacés !
arabic: فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن يَوۡمِهِمُ ٱلَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fawaylun lilladhīna kafarū min yawmihimu alladhī yūʿadūna
